CustomField.formula: IF( Record_Type_Name__c ='Student Semester', CASESAFEID(Semester__c), IF( Record_Type_Name__c ='Student Section', CASESAFEID(Section__r.hed__Parent_Term__r.Id) , IF( Record_Type_Name__c ='Student Batch', CASESAFEID(Student_Batch__r.hed__Parent_Term__r.hed__Parent_Term__r.Id), IF(Record_Type_Name__c ='Student Group Allocation', CASESAFEID(Student_Group__r.hed__Parent_Term__r.Id),'0'))))
CustomField.label: Semester ID
